channel.title: R on Brendan
channel.description: Recent content in R on Brendan

item.title: More than One way to Skin your Code- A Prespective on Python and R
item.description: I was first introduced to computer programing through python. As I gradually became a better programer, I started working with R. At first I was bewildered by the languages high functionality and intricacies. Compared to python R seemed like a mess, unsure of what it really wanted to be. However, the more I became fimilar with R I realized itâ€™s usefullness. Particulary, the R community is organized, connected, and receptive.
